abstract: Risa V Ferman, district attorney in Montgomery County, Pa,  files charges against state Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane that include obstruction of justice and perjury;  Kane refuses to resign, disputing accusation that she staged coverup after illegally giving grand jury documents to newspaper in order to embarrass a critic.
lead_paragraph: In announcing the charges, the Montgomery County district attorney said Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane was accused of leaking information from a 2009 investigation.

headline.main: Pennsylvania Attorney General, Kathleen Kane, Charged in Leak Case
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Attorney General Is Charged in a Conspiracy Involving Leaks and Lies

snippet: In announcing the charges, the Montgomery County district attorney said Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane was accused of leaking information from a 2009 investigation.
